name: mlflow-typescript
description: TypeScript implementation of MLflow Tracing SDK. This is the root workspace package that includes all the public packages as sub-directories.

scripts.build:subpackages: npm run build:core && npm run build:integrations
scripts.build:integrations: cd integrations/openai && npm run build && cd ../vercel && npm run build
scripts.test:subpackages: npm run test:core && npm run test:integrations
scripts.test:integrations: cd integrations/openai && npm run test && cd ../vercel && npm run test
